articles.author: Anuraag Peesara
articles.title: Asian Games 2023 boxing: Lovlina Borgohain wins silver medal - Olympics
articles.description: Indian boxer Lovlina Borgohain won the silver medal in the women’s 75kg at the Asian Games 2023 boxing tournament. She lost to China’s Li Qian 5:0 in the final on Wednesday.
articles.content: In the fight, Li Qian, former world champion and a two-time Olympic medallist, was on the offence from the outset but the Indian boxer managed to evade most of the punches. Borgohain landed a strong … [+1476 chars]

articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: Hangzhou Asian Games: India go past best ever Asiad medal tally, bettering previous high from 2018 in Indonesia - The Indian Express
articles.description: With medals assured to come in from boxing, squash, archery and bridge, and still a few track & field events left, Indian contingent will now be trying to get close to that 100-medal target.
articles.content: With two more medals coming early in the morning on Wednesday in Hangzhou, the Indian contingent officially went past their best tally ever at the Asian Games, crossing the 70 mark set in Jakarta-Pal… [+1313 chars]

articles.author: Sheila Chiang
articles.title: Ripple obtains full license to operate in Singapore as it expands in Asia-Pacific - CNBC
articles.description: Ripple said on Wednesday that it has obtained a full license to operate in Singapore, a strategic step toward growing its presence in the Asia-Pacific region.
articles.content:
Brad Garlinghouse, chief executive officer of Ripple Labs Inc.,speaks during the Token2049 conference in Singapore, on Wednesday, Sept. 13, 2023.
